name: Dragon Tiles [AGA]
overview: New version of Dragon Tiles made specifically for AGA machines, which uses the new AGA 256 colour mode and also included is a new title song. Each screen is made up of 120 tiles placed in piles of 4 high. In every screen there are 4 of each tile. The object of the game is to remove all of the tiles form the screen. You can only remove 2 tiles at a time and both must have an empty place on either the left or the right hand side.
